verses.roman:
punaḥ āsi' prabhu pāya karila vinaya
'ajña-aparādha' kṣamā karite yuyāya

synonyms: punaḥ āsi'-again coming back; prabhu pāya—at the lotus feet of the Lord; karila vinaya—made a submission; ajña-aparādha—offense by innocent person; kṣamā karite—to be excused; yuyāya—deserves.
translation: After Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī returned within the temple, he requested Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to excuse that innocent person.
